title: Settings
content: How do I add a camera and microphone?
creator: loriparker

title: "opt out of firefox platform" message
content: Periodically I see a story or article that has a "share this" option. When I click on the share button this message pops up: "User opted out of platform: The action attempted is disallowed, because the user has opted out of the Facebook platform." Huh? How does one opt in?
creator: RealGomer
